subject: A shipment from order #SSN2625 is on the way
description_text: Hi Can you please add related ticket from freshdesk to "ivan.tkachev1997@gmail.com" ? I can't view the status and progress of my problem, because it's impossible to login using current email. I'm tried to register and receive a message, that current user already registered. Also tried to use Forgot password and received the message "You are not authorised to access this portal. Kindly contact your helpdesk administrator.". May be it's because using .ru domen, because for my gmail "Forgot password" works fine. Also please respond where the parcel right now and what expected date of delivery to my address? -- Отправлено из мобильного приложения Яндекс Почты
